select
from od_order_document where is_del = 0 and order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and (bill_file_url is not null and bill_file_url <> '') order by id desc
mapper.update: update od_order_document set upt_operator = #{uptOperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, upt_time = #{uptTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_del = 1 where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and upload_operator is null and upload_time is null
